title: Henderson's Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Catering, Scottish
description: The Henderson's business includes vegetarian restaurants, a shop and deli, and art gallery. This location serves contemporary vegetarian cuisine, wherever possible using local, seasonal, and organic ingredients. Juices, beer and wine, snacks, meals, and desserts. Short walk from main train station, north of Princes St. Reported its bistro on Thistle St switched to being all-vegan in 2015.
